ğŸ§® Advanced Problem 1

â€œTry to solve it using only elementary school knowledge!â€

At a certain ranch, grass grows at a constant rate each day.

If 10 cows graze, the grass is completely eaten in 24 days If 15 cows graze, the grass is eaten in 12 days Each cow eats 1 unit of grass per day.

Questions: (1) How much grass grows per day? (2) How much grass was initially on the field? (3) If 8 cows graze, how many days will it take to eat all the grass?

ğŸ“ Hint

- Add the number of apples in each box.

- Simple addition!
